alert.note: Alert for Chester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 5:32PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Chester County through 600 PM EST... At 532 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Chester, or near Richburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Lawn, Richburg, Blackstock, Fishing Creek Reservoir, Cornwell and Edgemoor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
